Movie.Title: Shaun of the Dead
Movie.Description: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.

Movie.Title: Snatch
Movie.Description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Movie.Title: The Fifth Element
Movie.Description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.

Movie.Title: Spirited Away
Movie.Description: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into beasts.

Movie.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Movie.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Movie.Title: Inception
Movie.Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
